p.s: Title, making code behind Data Bound.
First of all on the parameter command, in the command file, I had Model dot property.
This gave a Null Reference Exception.
Instead, parameter as string is what goes there.
It is in the V M Base file, where I create the commands method, that I put string model's variable name.
Command binding requires full view Model and path equals command name, in cases where main container is bound Model.
Then for Command Parameter, just put Binding, space, property name from the Model.
Example, Command Parameter equals, in curly braces, binding ContentName.
